price: Rwose ababayeho mbere yabo (abahakanyi b’i Maka) barahinyuye. Mbega uko uburakari bwanjye bwari bumeze!
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: walaqad kadhaba alladhīna min qablihim fakayfa kāna nakīri
